Package com.example.treasurehunt

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AcceptThread
    MMNET Team 04 Project Title: Treasure Hunt Thread Description: Bluetooth server management, here a connection is accepted.
    BluetoothActivity
    MMNET Team 04 Project Title: Treasure Hunt Class Description: Main activity that manages Bluetooth and from which all the other activities are instantiated.
    CameraActivity
    MMNET Team 04 Project Title: Treasure Hunt Class Description: Activity called by the user that hides the treasure.
    CameraLib
    MMNET Team 04 Project Title: Treasure Hunt Class Description: Class used as a toolbox in order to capture focused pictures.
    ConnectionThread
    MMNET Team 04 Project Title: Treasure Hunt Thread Description: Bluetooth thread that implements the write/read functions on BT interface.
    ConnectThread
    MMNET Team 04 Project Title: Treasure Hunt Thread Description: Bluetooth Client management, here a connection request is sent to the selected Server.
    PreviewActivity
    MMNET Team 04 Project Title: Treasure Hunt Class Description: Activity called after the user has taken a picture in the "HIDE" phase.
    SearchActivity
    MMNET Team 04 Project Title: Treasure Hunt Class Description: Activity called by the user that seek the treasure.
    ShowDevices
    MMNET Team 04 Project Title: Treasure Hunt Class Description: This activity shows a list of real-time scanned BT visible devices.
    SplashActivity
    MMNET Team 04 Project Title: Treasure Hunt Class Description: This activity simply shows our application's cover
    TreasureActivity
    Title: TreasureActivity Description: Preview of the treasure in "give up" case Copyright: Copyright (c) 2015 Company: University of Trento, DISI Class description: the treasure is revealed if the user give up.
